posts.post_content:
Good afternoon,

Having recently sold both of my copies, I'm feeling a bit of seller's remorse.  Looking for a nice copy of the Thaddeus Wilkerson hilltop park PC. 

Please PM me with offers or leads.  

Many thanks in advance.
Anyone have one?  Know where to get one?
2.5 month bump.  Still kicking myself for selling both of my copies.

[quote name="arcadekrazy" post=1608525]2.5 month bump.  Still kicking myself for selling both of my copies.[/QUOTE]

you and me both!

sorry I don't have one to offer, but I unloaded BOTH of my examples a
few years back and it's one of my very few cases of "seller's remorse"!

best of luck to you in finding another.

.
How about throwing an example of it on here?

[quote name="ramram" post=1608650]How about throwing an example of it on here?[/QUOTE]

here's an example (NOT mine - Google image):

[quote name="FourStrikes" post=1608640]you and me both!

sorry I don't have one to offer, but I unloaded BOTH of my examples a
few years back and it's one of my very few cases of "seller's remorse"!

best of luck to you in finding another.

.[/QUOTE]

Yes, exactly - my only case of seller's remorse (I don't miss anything else from my collection EXCEPT this one item).  I sold the one with the chip missing (pictured here) and a much nicer copy too.
I thought I sent you a scan of one, but you was looking for a better image?  Whoops, never mind as I just figured out it was another member who was looking for an upgrade.   My bad.

[quote name="BeanTown" post=1608753]I thought I sent you a scan of one, but you was looking for a better image?  Whoops, never mind as I just figured out it was another member who was looking for an upgrade.   My bad.[/QUOTE]

sent you a PM
Bumpity bump bump bumpity bump - look at that postcard go.....in my collection?!?!?    Anyone?
One month bump - Anyone?

Pardon the early bump - 50 dollar finders fee to whomever can point me to one of these via private sale.   Public auctions/eBay/etc do not apply.  

If you know of someone who is looking to sell and we can consummate a deal, I will pay $50 to the individual who makes the connection. 

Thank you.
Remember the one I sent you
Yes, you sent me a scan but couldn't find the card.  It was in a safe deposit box that you were moving.  If you found it and want to make a deal, please PM me.
Found it from the bank box.  Email me an offer if interested.
Beautiful.
Hope you guys can make a deal.  Good luck, great looking PC.
Sent you a PM and another email

Who needs extra cash to settle up your rea winnings?   Maybe build some powder up for heritage?    Well if you have an example of this postcard, you're in luck!!!! I can send you cash in exchange for this postcard.    How awesome is that?!?!?

In all seriousness, does anyone have one to sell?

PM with details.   

Many thanks in advance.
Still looking.......

I don't want to be, all by myself.......

How about July?  Let's make this a good month.  This PC for me, cash for you!

Ok, so July wasn't the month.   How about august?

I'd like to buy something - I just walked the "east coast national" and there was really nothing appealing.
You didn't want JC's?
I have two of them but did we did not make a deal happen.  Plus, I need extra money for Heritage!
JC, you have two of them! Just give him one, don't be a hoarder!:D
Almost one year bounce.    Anyone have one to sell?
